'''Trudie Styler''' is Sting's wife who appeared in the [[season 8]] episode "[[The One With Monica's Boots]]". 

[[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] wants to get tickets for a Sting concert through [[Ben Geller|Ben]], who is in the same class as Sting's son. However, Trudie does see that Phoebe is just using Ben to get tickets and kicks her out.
